Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@...> wrote: 
            Amazing Steve you must have ESP.
   
  I was just in this radio shack site looking at this very radio.
   
  I will try it and let you know what I get.
   
  Thanks friend....
   
  Mike Edwards

Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:
      
I heard yes, maybe you should try the 20-125 radio. It has shortwave 
and a speaker built right in. The hack for that is up on my site.

http://www.keyportparanormal.com/simpleghostboxhack.html

-Steve H.
